ComicInfo.Title: Northampton Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Turtles struggle to recuperate in Northampton. Each Turtle deals with the new status quo in his own way, and each feels lost. But can they find their way to being a family again as the past haunts them?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------|-------------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Ross Campbell (a) | 1 | | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 2 | | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Andy Belanger (a) & Shari Chankhamma (c) | 3 |
